See supra pp 279-80 O nly one o f the countries quened gave preliminary indication lhat it would support the establishment of a
preinspection station within its territory See supra pp 279-80 & note 5; Ryan Letter at 2 W ithout that support,
the establishm ent o f preinspection stations in those countries does not appear possible. 282 Section 235A o f the Immigration and Nationality A ct section 235A as requiring the Executive either to seek or to obtain the consent
of foreign countries to the establishment of preinspection stations within their
territory. RANDOLPH D. MOSS
Assistant Attorney General
Office o f Legal Counsel 283
